channel.title: Luxe Skin Therapy on Prosper Us Detroit

item.title: People of ProsperUS: Scheherazade Berry-Huff
item.description: People of ProsperUS: Scheherazade Berry-Huff By: Weyman Cohen Luxe Skin Therapy is a holistic spa-inspired skin care line that is infused with elements of gold and silver minerals owned by Scheherazade Berry-Huff. Luxe Skin Therapy sells therapeutic products infused with minerals and skin care based on the alchemy of elements. Minerals can be used to treat problematic skin conditions (such as psoriasis, a condition that Scheherazade suffered from). Much of Luxe Skin Therapy’s clientele are people looking for remedies and treatments for various skin conditions.
